name: Rei Taro
profile_summary: Accomplished Senior Software Engineer with over 10 years of experience in shaping robust backend systems. Proficient in **NodeJS**, **Python** (FastAPI, Django, Flask), and API development, with a strong command of cloud services such as **AWS**, **GCP**, and **Azure**.
